sentences.sContent: While in ghost form, you will not be able to start battles, aggress, or run.
sentences.sContent_eng: While in ghost form, you will not be able to start battles, aggress, or run.
sentences.sCn: 处于幽灵状态时，你不能战斗，攻击，或者跑。

sentences.sContent: When translators translate, they usually invade and aggress on the original text, break the balance between the source text and target text and that between the source language and target language.
sentences.sContent_eng: When translators translate, they usually invade and aggress on the original text, break the balance between the source text and target text and that between the source language and target language.
sentences.sCn: 当译者进行翻译时，他们通常会对原文进行攻击和侵犯，打破原文和译文、源语言和目标语言之间的平衡。

words.tran: 侵略性的；好斗的；有进取心的；有闯劲的
侵略地；攻击地；有闯劲地
